comments.body: https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/blob/master/ledger-api/grpc-definitions/com/digitalasset/ledger/api/v1/admin/package_management_service.proto#L70, but thinking about it, I can replace it by `octet_length(package)`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@  source_description varchar,
  -- The size of the archive payload (i.e., the serialized DAML-LF package), in bytes
  size               bigint                not null,
  -- The time when the package was added
  known_since        timestamptz           not null,
